name: TheGoal
description:
Fulfill dreams of a small comet. Become a Planet!

Sometimes game freeze while generating asteroids fields. Just be patient and wait few more seconds. I'll fix it in update soon.

Music:

Enthusiast by Tours and Where it goes by Jahzzar

To do list is longer than the distance from Earth to Pluto so i'll update it soon. Have fun and happy new year!

Btw, sorry for misstyping in title screen. >.<
